plot: Picard is kidnapped and held with three different aliens and meanwhile replaced with a replica as impostor captain.

An unknown force transports Captain Jean-Luc Picard out of his quarters into a closed cell, where he joins three other captives of different races, including Federation cadet Mitena Haro, who have very different temperaments and mistrust each-other, but have no hope to escape unless they manage to collaborate. Meanwhile a perfect replica of Picard takes his place aboard the Enterprise, but Commander William T. Riker soon suspects he's too perfect and a danger for the ship...—KGF Vissers

Captain Picard's abducted by an unknown race and transported to a cell where three other aliens are also being held. A replication of Picard's placed aboard the ship. The real Captain Picard tries to find a commonality amongst the 44 captives which might help them to understand who and why they've been abducted.—garykmcd
Picard encounters 3 other beings when he is kidnapped and replaced with an imposter.—herbalista
